alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 6:18PM CST until further notice by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Huntsville AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tennessee River AT Florence affecting Colbert and Lauderdale Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tennessee River AT Florence. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Alabama State Highway 20 is flooded at the underpass below U.S. Highways 43 and 72. The underpass will likely be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to 20.4 feet. It will then remain above flood stage until further notice. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.5 feet on 07/12/1916. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
